text: Faouzi Mansouri (; 17 January 1956 – 18 May 2022) was an Algerian professional footballer. He played as a defender. He played with Montpellier. He also appeared in the Algeria national team thirteen times between 1981 until 1986. Mansouri died on 18 May 2022 at the age of 66.Football : l'ancien Croco et Montpelliérain Faouzi Mansouri s'est éteint à l'âge de 66 ans ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Algerian footballers
title: Faouzi Mansouri
